title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Greenland
purpose: To strengthen the UK-Greenland relationship on matters political, economic, social, cultural and scientific. To raise greater awareness about Greenland within the UK and promote closer cooperation with the Greenlandic parliament (The Inatsisarsut).

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 8783.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Dr Dwayne Menezes, Polar Research and Policy Initiative. Tel: 07342 034270
contact_details.secretariat: Polar Research and Policy Initiative acts as the group's secretariat.https://polarconnection.org/
